mapper.select: SELECT mno, mid, pwd, mname, gender, height, weight, bmi, birthday, regdate FROM member WHERE mid = #{mid} AND pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mid, pwd, mname, gender, height, weight, bmi, birthday, regdate) VALUES (#{mid}, #{pwd}, #{mname}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bmi}, #{birthday}, #{regdate});
